description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is not longer than 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the tenth course of twenty courses where

Edit any object or design.

  • Auto Digitize introduction, plus the tools that can be combined with it.
  • Manage artwork, know what type, what size and cleaness of the artwork.
  • Introduce the Magic Wand which is also an auto digitize function.
  • Photosnap is a very exiting choice to create your own fabric.
title: #13-15: Bernina Software 7: Fundamentals of Autodigitizing
